caption:
This photograph features a scene on a city street, showing a variety of vehicles and notable elements of urban life. The central focus is a white tow truck with "POLICE" labeled on its side, featuring a large towing crane. A police officer can be seen inside the truck, driving it across the street. Adjacent to the tow truck, there is a red convertible sports car with a roll bar behind its seats, suggesting this vehicle might be getting towed.

On the right side of the frame, parts of a motorcycle are visible, likely belonging to a police officer given the partial view of equipment that appears to be attached to it.

The scene is set against a backdrop containing urban elements: a row of trees in bloom, light posts, and a large plain building, creating a typical cityscape. The overcast sky suggests a slightly gloomy or overcast day. The street scene captures a moment seemingly busy with activity, possibly a traffic situation or public event, evidenced by the specialized vehicles and visible police presence.
title: Any car parked on Constitution Avenue, a major artery, is subject to tow-away after 3 pm.
